definitions.definition: a coloured liquid that is put on a surface such as a wall to decorate it:
tubes of paint or blocks of dried paint used for making pictures:
to cover a surface with paint:
examples: [ + obj + adj  ] We've painted the bedroom blue.

definitions.definition: to make a picture using paints:
examples: All these pictures were painted by local artists.

definitions.definition: If you paint your nails or face, you put make-up on that part of your body:
examples: She painted her nails bright red.
